Title: Colombian Presidential hopeful shot at Bogotá rally
Description:
A Colombian Presidential hopeful in critical condition after being shot during a campaign rally in Bogotá on Saturday.
The assassination attempt is having a chilling effect in Colombia where security has been backsliding recently.

Title: Boulder Jewish Festival moves forward with heightened security after attack
Description: The festival, which kicks off Sunday morning, is set to take place at the same site where a group was attacked with Molotov cocktails during a vigil for Israeli hostages in Gaza last week.

Title: India (and its kids) are out to conquer the world of chess
Description:
Chess is seeing a global resurgence, sparked by The Queen's Gambit and the pandemic impact on leisure time.
India is an emerging power player, with 85 grandmasters and intense chess schools for youth.

Title: NPR readers share stories of love and adversity in honor of Loving Day
Description:
June 12th is Loving Day, a holiday that commemorates the Loving v.
Virginia case, which allowed interracial marriage in all parts of the U.S.
NPR readers share how the case changed their lives.

Title: Recovery Failure: Why we struggle to rebuild for the next storm
